organizations.name: Linux
organizations.description: Linux has begun incorporating Rust into its kernel to enhance the security and reliability of the operating system. Using Rust helps reduce memory errors and vulnerabilities, providing a more secure kernel.

organizations.name: Exein
organizations.description: Exein uses Rust in developing its core security firmware, like Pulsar, leveraging Rust's safety and efficiency features to protect IoT devices and embedded systems.

organizations.name: Matic
organizations.description: Matic employs Rust across its platform to develop secure and efficient home robots. Rust allows them to create reliable, high-performance software for their robotic products.

organizations.name: AWS
organizations.description: AWS integrates Rust into its core services to improve performance and sustainability of its cloud infrastructure, leveraging Rust's efficiency and security features.

organizations.name: Azure
organizations.description: Azure is adopting Rust in its core services, following the recommendation of its CTO to prefer Rust over C/C++ for new developments, aiming to enhance the security and efficiency of its cloud platform.

organizations.name: Alphabet
organizations.description: Alphabet has started incorporating Rust into the Android core to improve the security and stability of the mobile operating system, reducing vulnerabilities and memory management errors.

organizations.name: Discord
organizations.description: Discord has migrated its main backend from Go to Rust to take advantage of Rust's high performance and efficiency, improving the scalability and stability of its communication platform.

organizations.name: Meta
organizations.description: Meta uses Rust in critical parts of its systems, leveraging its security and efficiency, and is working on integration with C++ to improve the development of its platforms.

organizations.name: Microsoft
organizations.description: Microsoft employs Rust to develop new features of Windows, benefiting from its security and performance to enhance the operating system.

organizations.name: Embark Studios
organizations.description: Embark Studios uses Rust in many aspects of video game development, leveraging its performance and safety to create innovative gaming experiences.

organizations.name: Redpanda
organizations.description: Redpanda develops a data streaming platform entirely in Rust, offering superior performance and reliability in real-time data processing.

organizations.name: Fly.io
organizations.description: Fly.io uses Rust throughout its infrastructure to provide high-efficiency cloud computing services, enabling applications to be deployed closer to users.

organizations.name: Parity Technologies
organizations.description: Parity Technologies develops blockchain solutions entirely in Rust, including Substrate and Polkadot, leveraging Rust's security and efficiency to create decentralized infrastructure.

organizations.name: 1Password
organizations.description: 1Password rewrote its application in Rust to improve security and performance in password management, offering a more secure experience to its users.

organizations.name: Cloudflare
organizations.description: Cloudflare uses Rust in its services to enhance security and performance of its web infrastructure, including projects like Pingora and its Workers platform.

organizations.name: Vercel
organizations.description: Vercel incorporates Rust in its new projects to improve performance and offer faster functions on its web application deployment platform.

organizations.name: Dropbox
organizations.description: Dropbox employs Rust in its backend to improve performance and efficiency of its cloud storage services, developing custom libraries in Rust.

organizations.name: Mozilla
organizations.description: Mozilla is the original creator of Rust and uses it in the development of its Firefox browser and other services, enhancing the security and performance of its products.

organizations.name: Nordic Semiconductor
organizations.description: Nordic Semiconductor employs Rust in the development of firmware for its devices, aiming to eliminate vulnerabilities and improve security in IoT applications.

organizations.name: Ferrous Systems
organizations.description: Ferrous Systems is a consultancy specializing in Rust, offering comprehensive services including development, training, and support for Rust projects.

organizations.name: Wire
organizations.description: Wire uses Rust to develop its secure messaging platform, benefiting from Rust's security and efficiency to protect communications.

organizations.name: DFINITY
organizations.description: DFINITY develops the Internet Computer using Rust to build a secure and scalable blockchain platform, enabling the execution of decentralized applications.

organizations.name: Ledger
organizations.description: Ledger employs Rust in the development of its applications and hardware wallets, improving security in cryptocurrency management.

organizations.name: Clever Cloud
organizations.description: Clever Cloud uses Rust in its services and infrastructure to offer more efficient and reliable cloud solutions.

organizations.name: Huawei
organizations.description: Huawei is incorporating Rust into its operating systems, services, and infrastructure to enhance the security and performance of its products.

organizations.name: Alibaba
organizations.description: Alibaba uses Rust in its services and infrastructure to improve efficiency and security across its technological platforms.

organizations.name: Tencent
organizations.description: Tencent employs Rust in developing services, enhancing the security and performance of its products, including network protocols like tQUIC.

organizations.name: Bytedance
organizations.description: Bytedance uses Rust in its services to improve performance and efficiency of its content platforms, such as TikTok.

organizations.name: Ant Group
organizations.description: Ant Group employs Rust in developing financial services, aiming to improve the security and efficiency of its platforms.

organizations.name: Tesla
organizations.description: Tesla uses Rust in critical parts, artificial intelligence, and services to enhance the security and performance of its vehicles and systems.

organizations.name: OpenAI
organizations.description: OpenAI employs Rust in ChatGPT and other services to improve performance and security in artificial intelligence processing.

organizations.name: SpaceX
organizations.description: SpaceX uses Rust in critical parts of its systems to enhance security and reliability in space missions.

organizations.name: Vivo
organizations.description: Vivo has developed BlueOS based on Rust to improve the security and performance of its electronic devices.

organizations.name: Airhart
organizations.description: Airhart uses Rust throughout its development to create secure and efficient aerospace solutions.

organizations.name: Spacety
organizations.description: Spacety employs Rust in its systems to improve security and efficiency in satellite technology.

organizations.name: European Space Agency
organizations.description: The European Space Agency uses Rust in its systems to enhance security and reliability in space technology.
